document_data.name: ''Drow Assassin's Arrow''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drow assassin's arrows''''' were powerful [[arrows]] created for the use of [[drow]] assassins of [[House Freth]].
document_data.Description: ''Drow assassin's arrows'' were slightly heavier than regular arrows and were tipped with [[adamantine]].
document_data.History: ''Drow assassin's arrows'' were brought to the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] in [[1369 DR]]. The assassins of [[House Freth]] armed with the deadly missiles were dispatched to eliminate the competing drow [[House Kilsek]] and a group of adventurers from [[Phlan]] that were active in the ruins and the [[Elven Catacombs]] under [[Castle Cormanthor]].
